content.rendered:
Our Philosophy

Our primary goal is to provide each client with the highest quality legal service and to obtain a fair and equitable resolution for each client. This goal will be accomplished through your attorneys’ diligence and dedicated work within the confines of the law and through a cooperative working relationship between attorney and client.

Our attorneys are qualified to resolve most legal disputes through negotiation, mediation, or compromise. Matters that are not settled in this manner will be litigated either before a judge, commissioner, a jury, or an arbitrator.

For over 100 years our firm has maintained a reputation for providing our clients with cost-effective legal services in an aggressive, professional, and honorable manner.

Whatever you current legal needs may be, we suggest that you contact our office to make an appointment to meet with one of our attorneys. We offer a free consultation for Estate Planning and Plaintiff Personal Injury matters. This initial consultation with one of our attorneys will allow you to develop a complete understanding of the legal issue involved.

Free Initial Consult for:

Estate Planning

Personal Injury (Plaintiff only)

Personal Injury matters are handled on a contingency basis with no fee charged unless a recovery is made. In all cases, any actual costs incurred must be paid by our client.

Practice Areas:
  • Personal Injury
  • Estate Planning
  • Estate Clearance/Probate
  • Guardianship
  • Elder Law
  • Family Law / Divorce
  • Real Estate
  • Business Formation
  • Business Transactions
  • Construction
  • Criminal
  • Adoptions
  • Landlord Matters
  • Trials and Appeals
